name.fil: Hi! How can I help you with Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™?
name.ja: パパのバーガリア アンブロック版™
name.th: ปาป่าเบอร์เจอเรีย ปลดล็อก™

short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Play Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!
short.bg: Играйте Papa's Burgeria Unblocked ™ като разширение за Chrome - Това също може да се играе без интернет, опитайте сега!
short.ca: Juega a Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ como una extensión de Chrome. También puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.cs: Hrajte Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ jako rozšíření pro Chrome - Můžete také hrát bez připojení k internetu, vyzkoušejte to teď!
short.da: Spil Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ som en Chrome-udvidelse - Du kan også spille det uden internet, prøv det nu!
short.de: Juega Papa's Burgeria Desbloqueado™ como una extensión de Chrome - También puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.el,es: Juega Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ como una extensión de Chrome - También puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Jouez à Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également y jouer sans Internet, essayez-le maintenant…
short.fi: Pelaa Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ Chromen laajennuksena - Voit myös pelata ilman internetyhteyttä, kokeile nyt!
short.fil: I-play ang Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ bilang isang extension ng Chrome - Maaari rin itong laruin kahit walang internet, subukan mo…
short.fr: Jouez à Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également y jouer sans Internet, essayez-le dès…
short.he: Juega a Papa's Burgeria Desbloqueada™ como una extensión de Chrome - ¡También puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet, pruébalo ahora!
short.hi: Jouez à Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également jouer sans Internet, essayez-le maintenant !
short.hr: Igrajte Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ kao Chrome proširenje - Takođe  može se igrati bez interneta, isprobajte sada!
short.hu: Játssza a Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™-et Chrome bővítményként - Próbálja ki most Internet nélkül is!
short.id: Mainkan Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ sebagai ekstensi Chrome - Juga dapat dimainkan tanpa internet, cobalah sekarang!
short.it: Juega Papa's Burgeria Desbloqueado™ como una extensión de Chrome - También puedes jugar sin internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.ja: クロム拡張機能としてPapa's Burgeria Unblocked™をプレイ - インターネットなしでもプレイできます。今すぐ試してみてください！
short.ko: Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™를 Chrome 확장 프로그램으로 플레이하세요 - 또한 인터넷 연결 없이도 플레이할 수 있습니다. 지금 바로 시도해보세요!
short.lt: Žaiskite Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ kaip „Chrome“ plėtinį - taip pat galite žaisti be interneto, išbandykite dabar!
short.lv: Spēlēt Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ kā Chrome paplašinājumu - Iespējams spēlēt bez interneta, izmēģini tagad!
short.ms: Mainkan Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ sebagai sambungan Chrome - Boleh dimainkan tanpa internet, cuba sekarang!
short.nl: Speel Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ als een Chrome-extensie - Je kunt het ook zonder internet spelen, probeer het nu!
short.no: Speel Papa se Burgeria Unblocked™ as 'n Chrome-uitbreiding - Jy kan ook sonder internet speel, probeer dit nou!
short.pl: Graj w Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ jako rozszerzenie Chrome - Możesz też grać bez internetu, spróbuj teraz!
short.ro: Joacă Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ ca o extensie Chrome - De asemenea, poți juca fără internet, încearcă acum!
short.ru: Играйте в Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ как расширение для Chrome - также можно играть без доступа к Интернету, попробуйте сейчас!
short.sl: Jouez à Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également jouer sans Internet, essayez dès maintenant !
short.sr: Играјте Папину Бургерију Неограничено™ као Хром проширење - Такође можете играти без интернета, пробајте одмах!
short.sv: Spela Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ som en Chrome-förlängning - Kan också spela utan Internet, prova det nu!
short.th: เล่น Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ เป็นส่วนขยายของ Chrome - ยังสามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องเชื่อมต่ออินเทอร์เน็ต ลองเล่นเดี๋ยวนี้!
short.tr: Juega a Papa's Burgeria Desbloqueada™ como una extensión de Chrome - Además, ¡puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet, pruébalo ahora!
short.uk: Грайте в Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ як розширення для Chrome - Також можна грати без Інтернету, спробуйте зараз!
short.vi: Chơi Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ như một tiện ích Chrome - Cũng có thể chơi mà không cần internet, hãy thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 作为Chrome扩展程序玩Papa's Burgeria已解锁™ - 也可离线游玩，立即试试！
short.zh_TW: 在 Chrome 擴充功能中玩 Papa's Burgeria 解封™ - 也可在無網路的情況下遊玩，立即試試看！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🍔 Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™ - Build, Flip, and Serve! 🍔

Get ready for a sizzling adventure in the world of 'Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™' on Chrome™! Unleash your culinary creativity as you step into the shoes of a burger-flipping maestro in this unblocked and free-to-play sensation.

🍟 Craft Your Culinary Masterpieces:
Take orders from hungry customers and craft mouthwatering burgers to perfection. Choose from an array of ingredients, grill patties to the right temperature, and stack them high with delicious toppings.

🌐 Unblocked and Unleashed:
Enjoy the addictive burger-building experience without any restrictions! 'Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™' is free and unblocked, letting you dive into the burger-flipping frenzy anytime, anywhere.

🎉 Serve Happy Customers:
Keep your customers smiling by delivering their orders promptly and accurately. Earn tips and use them to enhance your burger joint with exciting upgrades.

🍔 Customize Your Menu:
Experiment with new ingredients, sauces, and toppings to create unique burger combinations. Keep your menu fresh and exciting to attract a diverse range of hungry patrons.

🏆 Climb the Burger Biz Ladder:
Start as a humble grill master and work your way up the ranks. Face new challenges and unlock special toppings as you become the ultimate burger tycoon.

👥 Challenge Your Friends:
Compete with friends or other burger aficionados in special challenges. Showcase your burger-flipping skills and prove that you're the king or queen of the grill.

🎮 Easy Controls, Endless Fun:
With user-friendly controls and a captivating gameplay experience, 'Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™' is perfect for players of all ages. Enjoy the thrill of managing your own burger joint with ease.

🍔 Unleash Your Inner Chef:
Whether you're a seasoned gamer or a casual player, 'Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™' offers a delightful culinary adventure that's easy to pick up and play.

Indulge in the ultimate burger-flipping escapade now! Play 'Papa's Burgeria Unblocked™' on Chrome™ and become the burger maestro you were meant to be. 🍔👨‍🍳
Play more games on the top-left menu
